course_title: Evidence Based Practice for the Professional Nurse
class_notes: Section #400 is for MN + MSN Semester 2 students only.
course_description: Students will explore the research process and apply principles of evidence based practice to clinical care delivery. Emphasis will be on search strategies, and reviewing and synthesizing best research evidence for integration into practice.
sections: Class Nbr: 3118, Section #: 400, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 2-4:50p, Instructor: Team, Status: Open
